title: Around The World Housewives: RHOA, RHOC, RHONJ, & RHOD Recaps
itunes:title: Around The World Housewives: RHOA, RHOC, RHONJ, & RHOD Recaps
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps all four Housewives franchises that are currently airing. He starts with the season premiere of The Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of babies and the return of Kenya. Then we head to OC where the women begin to question Tam...
description:
Danny recaps all four Housewives franchises that are currently airing. He starts with the season premiere of The Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of babies and the return of Kenya. Then we head to OC where the women begin to question Tamra's motives. In the premiere of New Jersey, we are reacquainted with the wives at a surgery party. Finally, LeeAnne gets married on Real Housewives of Dallas.


#RHOA: 6:10ish

#RHOC: 24:03ish

#RHONJ: 40:10

#RHOD: 1 hour in


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
